caption:
I get a lot of freedom when it comes to creativity, but ultimately a campaign, no matter how high fashion the brand might be, still needs to sell the product.
The beauty of women is my one true love, so I could never imagine myself shooting without focusing on that. I found interesting merging my need with my client’s need in these portraits, where the heel remains the protagonist, but the veiled beauty behind still attracts the eye further deep into the picture.
📷
